channel.title: obfuscation on hg8's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in obfuscation on hg8's Notes

item.title: Bitlab - HackTheBox
item.description: Table of contents User flag. Recon Web-shell as www-data Pivot www-data -> clave user Root Flag Recon Reverse engineering of RemoteConnection.exe “Unintended” way to root Bitlab box was an interesting box, user part was typical real-life scenario (actually meet this scenario during multiple pentests) while the root part was my first time Reverse Engineering.
